hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found at #Zora's River#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that those who seek #sunken silver rupees# will find #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of #gold#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Epona's Song#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

ToT (Left).text: Oh!^Oh-oh!^C'mon!^Come on! Come on! Come on!^HOT!!^What a hot beat!^WHOOOOAH!^YEEEEAH!^YAHOOO!!

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Fire Bottle# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Small Key# and #a Boss Key#.
